title: Cost Types
content:
The Cost Types feature provides you with an easy way to manage all the expense types from a financial perspective. With Cost Types, you can categorize both capital expenditure (CAPEX) and operational expenditure (OPEX) into various types, such as payroll, taxes, communication, ERP, and software.

Related topics

  • How to create a cost type record
  • How to edit a cost type record
  • Cost type workflow
